mapper.select: SELECT A.TEAM_CD, (SELECT Z.COMN_CD_NM FROM TB_COMNCD Z WHERE Z.DIV_CD = 'CC01' AND Z.COMN_CD = A.TEAM_CD) TEAM_NM, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -5), 'YYYYMM') THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -4), 'YYYYMM') THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -3), 'YYYYMM') THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_3, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -2), 'YYYYMM') THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_4, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_5, SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYMM = #{yymm} THEN PMD_CNT ELSE 0 END) TREND_COUNT_6 FROM TB_CHARTDATA A WHERE 0=0 AND A.PRIORITY IN ('PC101', 'PC102', 'PC103') AND A.YYMM BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yymm}, 'YYYYMM'), -5), 'YYYYMM') AND #{yymm} GROUP BY A.TEAM_CD ORDER BY A.TEAM_CD
